patterns: How can I track my order on the website or app?
responses: You will be notified step-by-step on your opulent selection.

patterns: Are there any upcoming sales or promotions that I should be aware of?
responses: Our customers are the number 1 priority, we strive to communicate the latest and most attractive sales and promotions by notifying you as soon as possible.

patterns: Can you guide me on how to apply a discount code during checkout?
responses: Certainly, once a product is on sale or if you have a discount code you will be able to apply it to your cart. At checkout you will be asked to provide the code if you have one, and it will instantly be applied to your purchase.

patterns: What payment methods are accepted on the website or app.
responses: We accept all major credit cards such as Visa and Mastercard, customers are our priority, therefore we have partnered with the best network provider with cutting-edge technology for payments.

patterns: Is there a loyalty program, and how does it work?
responses: As of now we regret to inform you that there is no loyalty program, however if one should be established in the future. Our customers are the first to be informed.

patterns: How can I set up and manage my account preferences?
responses: Our platform is easy to use, you'll be able to set your preferences and manage them through settings in your profile.

patterns: Can you help me understand the return and exchange policy for my purchase?
responses: Of course! For pre-loved items, a no return policy applies. As for other products, you will be able to manage all returns and exchanges through the profile/more section of the platform.

patterns: Are there virtual try-on options available for products like luxury sunglasses or accessories?
responses: Unfortunately, this feature is not available

patterns: How often are new arrivals or limited edition items added to the inventory?
responses: New arrivals are regularly added as and when they’re available, limited editions will be added to our inventory and ready for sale to customers as soon as possible.

patterns: Can you provide more details about the materials used in a specific luxury product?
responses: Details about the materials used in the listed products are available in the description section of the products. Our top priority is helping our customers know as much as they can about all the products they wish to purchase.

patterns: What is the process for pre-ordering upcoming luxury releases?
responses: Pre-ordering goods would be exclusive to a selected curation of limited edition products, information for which will be provided to our customers.

patterns: Are there any customization options available for products like monogramming or engraving?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer this service.

patterns: How can I receive notifications about restocks for sold-out items?
responses: You will be notified promptly through the app as well as through email.

patterns: Can you assist me with sizing information for different product categories?
responses: All information pertaining to sizing and related measurement conversions can be accessed while viewing the product. There are sizing charts available for the products.

patterns: Is there a waitlist feature for high-demand products?
responses: For certain highly sought-after products, a waitlist might be introduced to assure the best level of service to all of our clients.

patterns: What measures are in place to ensure the security of personal and payment information?
responses: Our platform uses cutting-edge, industry-grade technologies that safeguard all personal information pertaining to our users. It is our top priority to ensure the safety and trust of users when personal and payment information is provided.

patterns: Can I save items to a wishlist for future reference?
responses: Of course, our customers can keep products on their wishlist for future reference. However, we can’t guarantee the product will be available at a later date.

patterns: How does the website or app handle international shipping and customs?
responses: We provide international shipping for our customers, and our team will update you if there are any matters relating to customs.

patterns: Are there product care tips or guides available for maintaining luxury items?
responses: In the spirit of best serving our customers, information regarding product care tips or guides is available in the description section.

patterns: Can you recommend complementary products based on my previous purchases or preferences?
responses: Of course! You will have recommendations available to you based on your previous purchases.

patterns: How can I sign up for newsletters or alerts to stay informed about new arrivals?
responses: You can stay informed by signing up for our newsletters, through our website, or through the app. You can easily sign up by adding your information. Stay tuned, and enjoy!

patterns: Are there any virtual events or launches that customers can participate in?
responses: All virtual events or launches will be communicated to our customers as and when applicable.

patterns: Can you guide me through the process of creating and managing a gift registry?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer this service at this moment.

patterns: What steps can I take if I encounter technical issues while using the websiteor app?
responses: Please contact customer support through Vaultsupport@anah.ae; a specialist will contact you as soon as possible.

patterns: Is there a mobile app available, and what additional features does it offer?
responses: Download our app through the App Store or through the Google Play Store, and indulge yourself in the convenience of what our website offers on your mobile device. You’ll be able to browse for pre-loved products, add them to your wishlist, and track your orders at the convenience of your device. Pay using Apple Pay or Google Pay seamlessly.

patterns: can I reserve items for a limited time before purchase?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer this service

patterns: Can you explain the process of reserving items for a limited time before purchase?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer this service

patterns: How does the website or app handle backorders for out-of-stock items?
responses: If a product is out-of-stock and the item is on your wishlist, you will be notified as soon as the item is available.

patterns: Are there any exclusive online-only products or collections?
responses: All products that are offered have been carefully curated while keeping our customers in-mind. Exclusive products, whether limited edition or exclusive, will be notified to our customers.

patterns: Can I schedule a virtual consultation for personalized shopping advice?
responses: If offered, virtual consultation for personalized shopping would be available through the convenience of the app.

patterns: What information is available about the craftsmanship and design of a specific luxury item?
responses: Details pertaining to the craftsmanship and design of all products are available in the description section of the product. Our top priority is helping our customers know as much as they can about all the products they wish to purchase.

patterns: Are there any membership programs with additional perks for loyal customers?
responses: Unfortunately, membership programs are not offered at this moment.

patterns: Can you assist me in locating items that may no longer be visible on the website?
responses: Certainly, for products you wish to purchase that may no longer be visible on our platform, please forward your inquiry to inquiryvault@anah.ae, and a member of our team will help make your wish a reality.

patterns: What measures are in place to ensure secure transactions and data privacy?
responses: We hold data privacy and the security of transactions at top priority; therefore, we have industry-grade solutions that ensure the safety of all information on the platform.

patterns: Is there a feature to save multiple shipping addresses for convenience?
responses: Yes, you will be able to add multiple shipping addresses for your convenience. However, please note that once an item is out for shipping, it can only be delivered to one address per order. For high-value products, please ensure proper identification is in place in order to avoid any mishaps.

patterns: Can you explain the process of joining a waitlist for pre-order or high-demand items?
responses: Once a sought-after product has been listed, customers will have the opportunity to show their interest by joining a waitlist. Your interest will be registered, and should the product be available to you, you will be notified promptly.

patterns: How often are product reviews updated on the website for customer reference?
responses: Product and customer reviews are handled carefully by a dedicated team, which strives to achieve the highest level of customer experience and satisfaction.

patterns: Are there size guides available for international customers using different measurement standards?
responses: Definitely, guides are available for international customers. All information pertaining to sizing and related measurement conversions can be accessed while viewing the product. There are sizing charts available for the products.

patterns: What options are there for gift wrapping or packaging customization?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not offer this service.

patterns: How does the website or app handle product releases in different time zones?
responses: Some product releases are regional; for the sake of a smoother experience for our clients, we address concerns related to time zone differences by putting forth additional measurements that aim at facilitating the most user-friendly approach. We include advanced notification measures together with global release schedules that approach the most user-friendly method.

patterns: How can I share my feedback or suggestions for improving the website or app?

patterns: Can you guide me through the process of setting up and managing a wish list?
responses: For products that you’re thinking of getting but not at the moment, we offer the ability to add them to a wishlist, whereby you can re-visit your selection at any given time. Just look for a heart icon for whichever product you are browsing; once selected, it will automatically be added to your wish list. You will always be able to go back to it at your convenience; just look out for the heart icon.
